column2: As a casting professional I want to be able to playback the clip from the carousel on a running list or to view the attachment
column14:
As soon as performer was added to a running list, a carousel is available when his slot is expanded.

If any attachments or clips were added, they are available in a carousel.

By click on attachment, a view window opens and user can view the attachment

By click on clip, a view window opens and user can playback the clip

column2: As Spotlight, I want to have play clip dialog every places clips are (related to #61406386 and #65630730)
